name: df-bj-mpt3
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wceq(cmpt3(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3), copab(s3, s4, wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wa(wceq(cv(s3), cotp(cv(s0), cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s4), c3)))))))
comment: Define maps-to notation for functions with three arguments. See ~ df-mpt and ~ df-mpo for functions with one and two arguments respectively. This definition is analogous to ~ bj-dfmpt2a . (Contributed by BJ, 11-Apr-2020.)
